name: Dan Lilker
description: '''Daniel Adam Lilker''' (born October 18, 1964) is an American musician best known as a bass player, but also guitarist, pianist, drummer, and vocalist. He has played bass in numerous [[Heavy metal music|heavy metal]] bands, including [[Anthrax (American band)|Anthrax]], [[Nuclear Assault]], [[Stormtroopers of Death|S.O.D.]] and [[Holy Moses]], and [[grindcore]] bands [[Brutal Truth]] and [[Exit-13]].
